site.title: aira | Race Your Algorithm – Virtual Robot Racing Platform
site.description: The ultimate playground for AI learners and researchers. Control virtual robots with Python, optimize energy usage (SOC), and master explainable AI.
site.ogDescription: Join the virtual race where strategy outweighs speed. Optimize your Python algorithms and achieve a perfect SOC ≈ 0 finish.

hero.subtitle: The ultimate playground for AI learners and researchers to master decision-making under constraints.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started: Your First Race
gettingStarted.description: Follow our simple tutorial to set up your environment and complete your first race. No prior experience needed!

steps.title: 1. Download & Setup
steps.description: Clone the repo from GitHub and run the setup script. You'll be ready in minutes.

steps.title: 2. Run the Sample
steps.description: Execute the provided sample code to see your robot run on the track immediately.

steps.title: 3. Make Your First Submission
steps.description: Modify the code, improve the strategy, and submit your result to the leaderboard.

competitions.title: Competitions
competitions.description: Test your skills in our official races. New challenges every month.

ranking.title: Global Ranking
ranking.description: See who is at the top of the ranks. The leaderboard is updated from the official race records.
